mapper.select: SELECT nf.file_id, nf.folder_id, sc.category_name, nf.file_name, nf.is_important, nf.created_at FROM note_file nf INNER JOIN script_category sc ON nf.category_id = sc.category_id WHERE folder_id = #{folderId} AND nf.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT folder_id FROM note_folder WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND parent_folder_id IS NULL
